actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

official_title: To establish a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences within the National Science Foundation.
short_title: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1990

summary.text: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1990 - Amends the National Science Foundation Act of 1950 to establish within the National Science Foundation a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences.

titles.title: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1990
To establish a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences within the National Science Foundation.
